Interface Notepad

All Known Implementing Classes:
ElectronicSecuredNotepad, SecuredNotepad, SimpleNotepad
public interface Notepad
Interface for Notepad

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    createPage(String title, String text)
    This method create new page in the Notepad as passing params title and text
    void
    deleteText(int pageNumber)
    This method deletes the whole text from defined page number.
    void
    previewAllPages()
    This method prints preview of all pages.
    void
    replaceText(int pageNumber, String text)
    This method replace the whole text from the given page number.

  • Method Details

    • createPage

      void createPage(String title, String text)
      This method create new page in the Notepad as passing params title and text
      Parameters:
      title - defines the page title
      text - defines the text on the page

    • replaceText

      void replaceText(int pageNumber, String text) throws NoPageFoundException
      This method replace the whole text from the given page number. It throws an exception if occurs when calling the method (checked exception)
      Parameters:
      pageNumber - defines which specific page will be affected.
      text - defines the new text
      Throws:
      NoPageFoundException - throws an exception (checked exception) if the passed page number does not exist, or it is not found.

    • deleteText

      void deleteText(int pageNumber) throws NoPageFoundException
      This method deletes the whole text from defined page number.
      Parameters:
      pageNumber - defines the page number where text to be deleted.
      Throws:
      NoPageFoundException - throws an exception (checked exception) if the passed page number does not exist,or it is not found.

    • previewAllPages

      void previewAllPages()
      This method prints preview of all pages.
